name: Alien Language Generator 02
description:
This interactive generative piece takes keyboard input and turns it into one of a variety alien cypher designs.

In Auto mode, it procedurally generates an endless stream of encoded characters that fill the screen with interesting colors and patterns.

Mobile devices are limited to Auto mode.

On desktops and laptops, start typing to convert a specific phrase. Press the right arrow key or simply click on the canvas to return to auto mode.

Alien Language Generator 01 can be found here: https://www.hicetnunc.xyz/objkt/241813
